"datenprivatsph√§re: warum gibt es noch keine eindeutige gesetzgebung? #datenschutz #priprivacy"

(translation: "data privacy: why is there still no clear legislation? #data protection #privacy")

this post critically examines the current state of data privacy laws and asks why there isn't any clear and comprehensive legislation in place to protect individuals' personal information. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #priprivacy (private privacy) are used to reach a wider audience interested in data privacy and to spark a discussion on the topic.
